titleInfo.title: On the continuity of the optimal policy set for linear programs

mods.abstract: For a linear program it is shown that the optimal policy set behaves continuously if the constraint vector changes on the set for which the program has a solution. The result implies that there exists a continuous optimal policy function for which a construction is indicated.
